text: Baru (kuro yo cha ki) hamile uniharula'i ra uniharuka babu bajela'i jivanaka sukha suvidhaka samagri pradana garyaum, yahamsam'ma ki uniharuko lamo umera bitihalyo. Ta ke tiniharule dekhdainan ki hamile dharatila'i tyasaka kinaraharubata ghata'umdai a'irakheka chaum, ani ke tiniharu abhimani rahanechan
